snippet: Presidents Omar Hassan al-Bashir of Sudan and Salva Kiir of South Sudan had agreed to pull back their armies before, but have yet to do so.
abstract: Presidents Omar Hassan al-Bashir of Sudan and Salva Kiir of South Sudan agree to set up demilitarized zone along their disputed border.
lead_paragraph: Presidents Omar Hassan al-Bashir of Sudan and Salva Kiir of South Sudan had agreed to pull back their armies before, but have yet to do so.

headline.main: Leaders Plan Buffer Zone at Sudan Border
headline.print_headline: Leaders Plan Buffer Zone at Sudan Border
